name: Chimera Gallery（奇美拉展馆）
summary: Chimera Gallery, crafted by the Xiamen Typhon team, is a platform that merges art with technology. It aims to provide not just opportunities for art appreciation but also spaces for entrepreneurship and innovation. The project offers various usage modes, including offline mode, website mode, and free server mode, allowing users to customize and share their own metaverse galleries according to their personal needs and preferences.
